issue.title: [CF 1547] Tell Me When no longer opens in game
issue.body:
When I type /tmw the window does not pop up & if I open it from the interface menu it just says tell me when v 8.5.3

 

Is this just due to the new expansion, or is this something I need to fix for my computer specifically?


> Posted by CurseForge user iryank | Imported from CurseForge issue #1547 | Raw

comments.body:
Is this still happening to you? Seems like it could be related to the same root cause as https://wow.curseforge.com/projects/tellmewhen/issues/1546

Edited Aug 14, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That link is just bringing me back to this same page :(


> Posted by CurseForge user iryank

I dont think I was able to view it in time, while issue 1546 was still in existence


> Posted by CurseForge user iryank

Fixed the link. However, I doubt this is the same problem - I suspected it was because it came in at almost the same time, and the cause of the other issue appeared at first glance to have been caused by a sudden WoW hotfix. This was later ruled out to not be the case.

Edited Aug 14, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I reinstalled & it appears to be working again.  I accidentally deleted all past data for tmw so I am resetting it all up, but hey  just happy that it is working again.  The game is not the same without this addon.  Appreciate the support!


> Posted by CurseForge user iryank
